original_title: IUSF goes to meet UGC; Heavy police presence in Colombo 7 with Water Cannons and Riot Police
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); University Students including Convener of the Inter-University Students Federation Wasantha Mudalige visited the University Grants Commission for talks.
The students activists visited the premises to discuss the student issues at the Sabaragamuwa University.
Water cannon trucks and Riot Police were deployed in the area during their visit.
SriLankan, SLT, Litro Gas, SLIC among SOEs to undergo divestment process – Finance Ministry
Opposition groups meet diplomats in Colombo to discuss current state of affairs
